# Heavy Vehicles

The SAAQ ensures that heavy vehicles used for road transportation of goods and passengers in Québec comply with laws and regulations.

## Heavy vehicles are...

- A road vehicle with a gross vehicle weight rating (GVWR) of 4,500 kg or more
- A combination of road vehicles with a gross combination weight rating of 4,500 kg or more
- A tow truck
- A road vehicle transporting dangerous substances requiring the display of safety marks
- A bus
- A minibus

Some heavy vehicles are exempt from several obligations set forth in the _Act respecting owners, operators and drivers of heavy vehicles_. Visit the website of the [Ministère des Transports⁠ ⁠](https://www.transports.gouv.qc.ca/en/Pages/Home.aspx) to find out more.

Last update: August 9, 2024
